desc.1: Perform up to five attacks forward, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: This skill's Anti-Interrupt Level increases during the 3rd and 4th hit.

desc.1: Deploy a Grand Tai Chi Formation, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the skill ends, automatically launch the 5th hit of Basic Attack: Cirrus Strike.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: While possessing Auric Ink Point, tap <IconNormal /> while Dodge: Nimbus Step is active or hold <IconEvade /> to activate:

desc.2: When the skill ends, it automatically triggers Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption.
desc.3: While channeling, continuously recover Adrenaline, recovering 7/s, for up to 3s.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill, and enters the Vital View state.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick}, hold <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: Enter a high‐speed <ct color=#FFFFFF>Light as Air</ct> state. While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Light as Air</ct> state in Investigation Zone Mode, automatically collect from all resource pickup points within range.
desc.2: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Light as Air</ct> state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to steer. Release the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to stop.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable at the moment this skill activates.

desc.1: Launch a series of attacks on enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Swiftly retreat, then attack forward, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: While retreating, a Perfect Dodge can be triggered, but cannot be followed up with a Dodge Counter.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackInkManifestation.name: EX Special Attack: Ink Manifestation

desc.0: With enough Adrenaline, press or hold <IconSpecialReadyRp /> to activate:
desc.1: Charge continuously, and release <IconSpecialReadyRp /> to launch an upward wing attack, dealing massive <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: While charging, incoming attacks are automatically blocked and will activate the upward wing attack.
desc.3: If hit at the exact moment charging begins, it triggers a Perfect Block effect, negating the DMG and increasing the skill's Interrupt Level to match a Heavy Defensive Assist, and recovering 10 Adrenaline.
desc.4: When an upward wing strike hits an enemy with a red flash or yellow flash, a Perfect Block can be triggered, negating the hit and increasing the skill's Interrupt Level to match a Defensive Assist and recovering 10 Adrenaline.
desc.5: The Perfect Block effect can occur at most once every 0.5s.
desc.6: If charged until flashing or when triggering the Perfect Block effect, the upward wing attack can be followed by an additional Talisman Attack.
desc.7: After the skill, press <IconSpecial /> to launch EX Special Attack: Celestial Cloud Blitz - Break.
desc.8: After EX Special Attack: Celestial Cloud Blitz - Break, and with enough Adrenaline, press <IconSpecialReadyRp /> to consume another 20 Adrenaline to launch EX Special Attack: Qingming Eruption - Break.
desc.9: After using EX Special Attack: Qingming Eruption - Break and with enough Auric Ink Points, hold <IconEvade /> to quickly follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Auric Array</ct>.
desc.10: Character is invulnerable during the upward wing attack, and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while charging.

desc.0: With enough Adrenaline, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Continuously charge up, channeling energy around enemies to deal DMG over time, up to a max of 2s, dealing massive <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Once fully charged or if interrupted, automatically trigger EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows.
desc.3: At the moment the skill is activated, a Perfect Dodge can be triggered. After the Perfect Dodge, enter the Vital View state.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Rapidly dash forward and attack, followed by an explosive wing burst, dealing massive <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.2: Upon activating this skill, Yixuan evenly redistributes the squad's HP.
desc.3: After using this skill and with enough Auric Ink Points, hold <IconEvade /> to quickly follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Auric Array</ct>.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.2: With both enough Technique Points and Decibels, this skill triggers with priority.
desc.3: After using this skill and with enough Auric Ink Points, hold <IconEvade /> to quickly follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Auric Array</ct>.
desc.4: Upon activating this skill, Yixuan evenly redistributes the squad's HP.
desc.5: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.

desc.0: Yixuan gains extra Sheer Force based on her Max HP, with every 1 point of Max HP increasing Sheer Force by 0.1.
desc.1: All <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</ct> Yixuan deals via her skills is Sheer DMG, ignoring enemy DEF and using her Sheer Force stat as the DMG Multiplier.
desc.2: When Yixuan accumulates <ct color=#FE437E>Auric Ink Anomaly Buildup</ct>, it uses an independent Anomaly Buildup gauge, and when triggering an Anomaly, she restores an additional 10 Adrenaline. This can trigger once every 10s.
desc.3: Upon entering combat, Yixuan immediately restores all Adrenaline. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can only trigger once every 180s. Triggering a Perfect Dodge grants an additional 5 Adrenaline and can occur at most once per second.
desc.4: When she consumes Adrenaline, Yixuan accumulates Technique Points, gaining 0.667 points for each point of Adrenaline consumed. With enough Technique Points, she can trigger an additional Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression. The maximum for Technique Points is 120.
desc.5: The DMG dealt by Yixuan's Basic Attack: Auric Array, Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption, EX Special Attack, Assist Follow-Up, Chain Attack, and Ultimate increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>30%</ct>.
desc.6: After launching Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression, Yixuan gains one Auric Ink Point. She can spend an Auric Ink Point to launch Basic Attack: Auric Array.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Stun</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Support</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defense</ct> character:
desc.1: When a fellow squad member uses an Ultimate, Yixuan continuously recovers 2 Adrenaline over 10s. If Yixuan is switched out by a Perfect Assist, she automatically follows up with a lightning strike attack, dealing DMG equal to 225% of her Sheer Force and restoring an additional 5 Adrenaline.
desc.2: EX Special Attack: Cloud-Shaper and EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows deal 30% increased DMG to Stunned enemies.
desc.3: After activating her Ultimate, Yixuan enters the Meditation state, increasing her CRIT DMG by 40% for 15s.

1.name: Spiritual Path
1.desc: Upon entering combat, CRIT Rate increases by 10% and immediately gain 120 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Technique Points</ct>. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can only trigger once every 180s. When any squad member lands a hit on an enemy, Yixuan automatically summons an extra lightning strike, dealing DMG equal to 50% of her Sheer Force and restoring 5 additional Adrenaline. This can trigger once every 6s.

flavor.0: "Fate is ever-changing and the path ahead uncertain. Only a pure, peaceful spirit holds firm. Even through the tides of time, I harbor no regrets."
flavor.1: "The mystic arts take a thousand forms, yet its core stays the same; the road may fork and falter, but the spirit stays steadfast."
flavor.2: "No matter the peril you face or the foe you meet, improvise as needed and face them with composure."

2.name: Ward Off Misfortune
2.desc: When an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> deals DMG, it ignores 15% of the target's <ct color=#FE437E>Ether RES</ct>. Triggering <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Qingming Skyshade</ct> extends all enemies' Stunned state by 3s. In a single Stun state duration, enemies can only have this effect applied once, and it does not stack with similar effects. Additionally, when using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression</ct>, gain one stack of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Condensed Ink</ct> effect. After <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows</ct>, press the Basic Attack button, or after <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Qingming Eruption - Break</ct>, press the Special Attack button to consume one stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Condensed Ink</ct> and launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Endless Talisman Suppression - Break</ct>, dealing DMG up to 1,200% of Sheer Force. Only one stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Condensed Ink</ct> can be held at a time.

flavor.0: "Life's twists are unpredictable — at best, the diviner discerns but a fraction."
flavor.1: "Dispelling misfortune and blessing rituals are merely reading the signs to pursue gain and avoid peril."
flavor.2: "Once you understand how to sidestep misfortune, you can just as easily cast it upon your foe... just call forth the calamity they've yet to face."

3.name: Cycle of Yin and Yang
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Everything in the world follows laws of mutual generation and restraint; by understanding that principle, you can balance yin and yang to overpower your foes."
flavor.1: "Achieving optimal results with simple techniques isn't cutting corners, but a natural result of following the flow."

4.name: The One Path of Mysticism
4.desc: Activating an <ct color=#FFFFFF> Ultimate</ct> grants one stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tranquility</ct>, up to a max of 2 stacks. For each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Tranquility</ct>, the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cloud-Shaper</ct> DMG and <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows</ct> DMG increase by 30%.

flavor.0: "It's said that countless transformations arise from a single principle. In studying the mystic arts, one must not be bound by forms but must grasp their underlying meaning."
flavor.1: "If you can perceive the core principles, each technique flows into another. Such is the path of the mystic: infinite forms converge into unity."

5.name: Calm Sky Vigil
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "To master the mystic arts, diligent study and reflection are but the start — you must learn to maintain a pure mind, listening to the wind and watching the clouds."
flavor.1: "When you transcend self and world, your command of Ether grows ever stronger, almost without effort."
flavor.2: "As you persist, you'll be able to maintain inner poise through any trial, meeting any change with unshakable calm."

6.name: Swift Yet Still
6.desc: After using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Qingming Skyshade</ct>, gain a stack of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Regulated Breathing</ct> effect. While under this effect, you can ignore the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Technique Point</ct> cost to launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression</ct> once. The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Regulated Breathing</ct> effect ends after <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression</ct> is used. This effect can only be gained once every 30s. Only one stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Regulated Breathing</ct> can be held. Additionally, while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Meditation</ct> state, Yixuan's Sheer DMG is increased by 20%.

flavor.0: "Tranquility to govern force, motion and calm coexist. In every movement there lies a pause, and in every pause a potential for energy."
flavor.1: "At any moment, if your mind remains clear, you can meet endless change with unchanging focus — and strike for victory at just the right moment."
flavor.3: "If not, that's okay... after silent contemplation, there comes that instant of awakening. This is yet another expression of 'swift yet still.'"
